response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value and potential impact on your projects, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $11,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I look forward to discussing how this product can benefit your endeavors further. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to proceed.", "product_price": 11500}
